Npc0342:
ï¿½I came to buy condiments...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I wonder what would be good...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The right condiment makes a dish taste better,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½while the wrong one makes it taste worse.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If the condiment matches the food,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½you will get more power than if you ate the food item plain.[HALT][END]
